Key Match Events: The Mets were shut out, 6-0, by the Milwaukee Brewers
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets needed to win the game on Saturday night
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso credited the Brewers' pitching but knew the team needed to turn things around fast if they wanted to make the postseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets have dropped three straight games and sit in the third NL Wild Card spot, a game back of the Atlanta Braves for the two-spot
Others: The Mets could clinch a playoff spot Sunday if they beat the Brewers and the Arizona Diamondbacks lose
